response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Given its significance, I believe it's only fair to extend this offer with a price that reflects its true worth and acknowledges your potential to appreciate and utilize its full potential. Considering the product's intrinsic value to you, which I understand to be $1,200,000, I propose to sell it to you at a price of $950,000. This offer allows you to secure the product at a premium yet reasonable cost, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product, and I would be more than happy to provide it. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
